action.action-desc: Mr. Simpson introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Natural Resources

form.official-title: To amend the Omnibus Public Land Management Act of 2009 to authorize certain extraordinary operation and maintenance work for urban canals of concern.

section.header: Extraordinary operation and maintenance work performed by the Secretary

subsection.text: Section 9601 of the Omnibus Public Land Management Act of 2009 (43 U.S.C. 510) is amended—

paragraph.text: by redesignating paragraphs (1), (2), (3), (4), (5), (6), and (7) as paragraphs (2), (3), (4), (5), (6), (7), and (1), respectively;
in paragraph (3) (as so redesignated), by striking et seq.) and inserting et seq.));
in paragraph (4) (as so redesignated), by striking mean and inserting means; and
by adding at the end the following:
The term urban canal of concern means a transferred works or segment of a transferred works—

subparagraph.text: that conveys water through a densely populated urban area; and

with respect to which the Secretary determines, pursuant to the guidelines and criteria developed under section 9602(a), that if a failure were to occur, the failure would result in loss of life and property in the vicinity of the failed transferred works or segment of transferred works.

subsection.header: Extraordinary maintenance and operation work on urban canal of concerns
subsection.text: Section 9603 of the Omnibus Public Land Management Act of 2009 (43 U.S.C. 510b) is amended—

clause.text: by striking carry out any and inserting the following:
in subparagraph (A) (as so designated), by striking the period at the end and inserting ; or; and
by adding at the end the following:

subparagraph.text: any extraordinary maintenance and operation work on an urban canal of concern.
in paragraph (3), in the first sentence—

clause.text: by striking If the Secretary and inserting In the case of extraordinary maintenance and operation work on an urban canal of concern authorized under paragraph (1) or if the Secretary;
by striking , which and inserting that; and
by inserting or to carry out the extraordinary maintenance and operation work on the urban canal of concern after imminent harm; and

paragraph.text: by adding at the end the following:

subsection.text: Any reimbursable funds provided under this section shall be considered to be a non-Federal source of funds for purposes of any cost-sharing requirement for a Federal grant.
